code: import React from'react';import'./MovieList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieList=_ref=>{let{movies,onEdit,onDelete}=_ref;if(!movies||movies.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No movies found."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-list",children:movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[movie.title," (",movie.releaseYear,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Director:"})," ",movie.director]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Cast:"})," ",movie.casting]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"movie-description",children:movie.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit-button",onClick:()=>onEdit(movie),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>onDelete(movie.id),children:"Delete"})]})]},movie.id))});};export default MovieList;
